overview:
Founder with Neville Brody of Research Studios Barcelona, part of a leading multi-disciplinary creative network, and OpenCity project platform for shared urban management and communication.

Trained as a graphic designer he is a media professional with a wide view on communications and experience across multiple design platforms.

Apologist of design as a tool for transformation my aim is that every product, business, city or organization reaches it’s full social, economic and cultural potential.

Based in Barcelona and working for the rest of the world.
